data.title: Holly Marie Combs
authors: Contributors to The Charmed Comics Wiki
data.meta_description: Holly Marie Combs plays the role of Piper Halliwell on Charmed. She was part of the initial starring cast and remained a starring cast member until the eighth season. Holly Marie Combs is an American actress and television producer, best known for her role as Piper Halliwell on The WB television...
data.text:
Holly Marie Combs plays the role of Piper Halliwell on Charmed. She was part of the initial starring cast and remained a starring cast member until the eighth season.

Holly Marie Combs is an American actress and television producer, best known for her role as Piper Halliwell on The WB television series Charmed (1998–2006). During the mid-90s, Combs appeared as Kimberly Brock on the CBS television series Picket Fences (1992–1996), which earned her a Young Artist Award. She also starred in films such as Sweet Hearts Dance (1988), Born on the Fourth of July (1989), Dr. Giggles (1992), Sins of Silence (1996), Daughters (1997) and Love's Deadly Triangle: The Texas Cadet Murder (1997). Combs is currently starring in the ABC Family television series Pretty Little Liars as Ella Montgomery.

In 1993, Holly married Bryan Travis Smith. She then divorced him in 1997. She remarried to David W. Donoho in 2004, but divorced him in 2011.

Donoho and Combs are the parents of three sons: Finley Arthur Donoho, (born April 26, 2004), Riley Edward Donoho, (born October 26, 2006) and Kelley James Donoho, (born May 26, 2009), all born by caesarian section (with Kelley being an emergency C-section). Combs kept her third pregnancy a secret because it was high risk, with a delivery at 35 weeks. Combs smoked cigarettes from the age of 15 until giving them up when pregnant with her first child.In November 2011, she filed for divorce for her second marriage, citing irreconcilable differences.
